metadata.name: File With Suspicious Extension Downloaded Via Bitsadmin
metadata.comment: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file with a suspicious extension

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\bitsadmin.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('bitsadmin.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /transfer ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /create ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /addfile '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.7z')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.asax')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ashx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.asmx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.asp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.aspx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cfm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cgi')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.chm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gif')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpeg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jsp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jspx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.log')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.png')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.psm1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.rar')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.scf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sct')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.war')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.wsf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.wsh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.zip'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file with a suspicious extension
